projects.title: SSDM Project
projects.description: The SSDM project tracks vehicles entering and exiting a dealership's service drive using RFID technology, capturing VIN numbers to identify customers and display a personalized welcome message.

projects.title: Network Inventory
projects.description: The Network Inventory System tracks network devices, managing IP addresses efficiently.

projects.title: Controlled Advertisement
projects.description: Custom dashboard managing advertisement videos, significantly reducing costs.
